EmailTemplate.description: User Announcements for Sprint 27A - Changes to Opportunities and Tour Booking
EmailTemplate.name: Upcoming Salesforce Changes 27A Enterprise V2
EmailTemplate.subject: PLEASE READ: Enterprise Salesforce Updates - 5/14/18
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Receiving_User.FirstName},
This week's release contains changes to Opportunity management and Tour Booking.
Managing Products
We've modified the "Manage Products" and "Split Opportunity" pages within Opportunities for improved clarity.
Now, users may designate an added product as a "Primary Product". For multi-product Opportunities, the product line item marked as the "Primary Product" will determine which Building/Nearest Building and Geography that the Opportunity inherits.
Updated Opportunity Names
Opportunity Names will update based on the products associated with it to provide additional clarity.
Opportunity names will show the Account - Product Classification -City/Building (if appropriate) - Close Date
If you have any questions or concerns, please contact us at salesforcesupport@wework.com
